document_notes.text:
This update for ncurses fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:
- CVE-2017-10684: Possible RCE via stack-based buffer overflow in the fmt_entry function. (bsc#1046858)
- CVE-2017-10685: Possible RCE with format string vulnerability in the fmt_entry function. (bsc#1046853)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: In ncurses 6.0, there is a stack-based buffer overflow in the fmt_entry function. A crafted input will lead to a remote arbitrary code execution attack.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

notes.text: In ncurses 6.0, there is a format string vulnerability in the fmt_entry function. A crafted input will lead to a remote arbitrary code execution attack.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
